name: Leah's Light Path
description:
Leah's Light Path is a 2D suspense platform game inspired by Limbo, in which we play as a little girl. 

Story

The game takes place inside a dangerous forest at night, where you will have to make your way through to find out why your father has not come back home. 
Will you make it through? Will your father be alright? Only one way to find out! 

Controls

A and D keys – to move through the level.

Space bar – to jump.

Left click – to activate the lanterns in the lantern puzzle before the locked door and to increase the intensity of the light the butterfly emits.

Hold Left Click – to move certain objects, such as boxes.

Made with my friend:

@faro_max

Leah’s Light Path was a student project for our second year project in the Design and Production of Video Games career.
